name: Hardboiled Detective - The Defenestration of Humpty Dumpty
name_original: Hardboiled Detective - The Defenestration of Humpty Dumpty
description:
Made as my Game Design 1 midterm project.

A short (about 10-15) minute experience about solving the mysterious death of Humpty Dumpty.

Featuring:

  • one (1) thrilling ending to discover
  • an excessive amount of egg-related puns and verbal gags
  • a toilet that you can flush
  • relatively cheesy noir detective dialogue
